#summary Proposed changes to the Structural Semantics Vocabulary

= Overview =

This wiki page represents a consolidation of all issues opened against the Structural Semantics Vocabulary in the 3.0.1 issue tracker.

The information on this page will be used as a starting point for further discussions of changes to the document.

= Issues =

[https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/list?can=2&q=spec=StructureVocab Filtered list of open issues.]

== General Clarification ==

  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=266 Issue 266] -- That the HTML usage contexts are only recommendations needs to be made clearer, as there are (edge) cases that don't always fit, causing confusion for content creators about the validity

== Property Changes ==

=== Clarifications ===

  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=197 Issue 197] -- Clarify that bodymatter term is not equivalent of XHTML body element
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=198 Issue 198] -- Is it possible to use afterword for a postscript or concluding note
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=222 Issue 222] -- Clarify relationship/use of note in relation to endnote and footnote properties (also raised in [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=266 Issue 266])
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=266 Issue 266] -- Plural forms are sometimes missing, like with practice when a section may contain more than one
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=266 Issue 266] -- Clearly define the meaning of marginalia: is it content in the margin or a type of annotation/note

=== Additions ===

  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=198 Issue 198] -- Add additional terms for cover elements (front/back/flaps)
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=198 Issue 198] -- Add additional term for chapter/division title pages
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=198 Issue 198] -- Add additional term for revision histories
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=223 Issue 223] -- Add semantics for individual parts of a title (number/title/subtitle)
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=229 Issue 229] -- Add list of audio and list of video properties for nav doc use
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=261 Issue 261] -- Add figure semantic for media overlays (also reqested for indexes in issue [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=297 Issue 297])
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=266 Issue 266] -- Add more properties for educational producers (learning objective/learning outcome/standard and assessment (question & answer) are specifically noted)
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=296 Issue 296] -- General request by index group to expand property list (photograph, flowchart, graph, code-example, equation, map were cited)
  * [https://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/issues/detail?id=297 Issue 297] -- Add properties defined in the index/dictionary work to the structure vocab to avoid prefixing

=== Additional Requests ===

Please add additional structure property names not specifically covered above to the list here. Include a short description for each explaining the intended use.
